mapper.select: SELECT order_main.order_id, order_main.order_no, order_main.order_name, order_main.revert_flag, order_main.batch_id, order_main.product_name, order_main.accelerator_k_value, order_main.art_name, order_main.load_method, order_main.path_name, order_main.number_turns, order_main.box_length, order_main.box_width, order_main.box_height, order_main.box_weight, order_main.sl_upper_limit, order_main.sl_set, order_main.gl_upper_limit, order_main.sl_lower_limit, order_main.gl_set, order_main.gl_lower_limit, order_main.sk_upper_limit, order_main.sk_set, order_main.sk_lower_limit, order_main.smpl_upper_limit, order_main.smpl_set, order_main.smpl_lower_limit, order_main.pfn_upper_limit, order_main.pfn_set, order_main.nl_set, order_main.pfn_lower_limit, order_main.nl_upper_limit, order_main.nl_lower_limit, order_main.order_box_num, order_main.eliminate_box_num, order_main.exhibit_box_num, order_main.qualified_box_num, order_main.sx_speed_set, order_main.sx_speed_upper_limit, order_main.sx_speed_lower_limit FROM dbo.order_main where order_status < 400 ORDER BY create_time desc

SELECT order_main.order_id, order_main.order_no, order_main.order_name, order_main.revert_flag, order_main.batch_id, order_main.product_name, order_main.accelerator_k_value, order_main.art_name, order_main.load_method, order_main.path_name, order_main.number_turns, order_main.box_length, order_main.box_width, order_main.box_height, order_main.box_weight, order_main.sl_upper_limit, order_main.sl_set, order_main.gl_upper_limit, order_main.sl_lower_limit, order_main.gl_set, order_main.gl_lower_limit, order_main.sk_upper_limit, order_main.sk_set, order_main.sk_lower_limit, order_main.smpl_upper_limit, order_main.smpl_set, order_main.smpl_lower_limit, order_main.pfn_upper_limit, order_main.pfn_set, order_main.nl_set, order_main.pfn_lower_limit, order_main.nl_upper_limit, order_main.nl_lower_limit, order_main.order_box_num, order_main.eliminate_box_num, order_main.exhibit_box_num, order_main.qualified_box_num FROM dbo.order_main where order_status = 400 and order_main.order_no = #{orderNo}
